title: from "Shard" series Platter, 1986
markings: inscribed in clay on bottom: Val Cushing / 1986 / Alfred N. Y.
inscribed: Inscribed in clay on bottom: "Val Cushing/1986/Alfred N.Y."
provenance: Henry Bauer Gallery, Alfred, New York
dimensions: H x diam.: 15 x 52 cm (5 7/8 x 20 1/2 in.)
description: Circular with flat bottom, swelling sides with flat rim; two upright loop handles; three semispherical bosses under each handle inside and out; central boss inside base surrounded by irregularly-shaped applied shards; overall brownish-golden color with blueish-grey inside Circular with flat bottom. Swelling sides with flat rim. Two loop handleswith three semispherical bosses under each handle inside and out. Central boss inside base surrounded by irregularly shaped shards. Overall brownish golden glaze, with bluish-grey inside.
